verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your steadfast love extends to the heavens, Your faithfulness reaches to the clouds, Your righteousness is like majestic mountains, And Your wisdom like the depths of the sea. And You come to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Filling my heart is Your lovingkindness, I find my peace in the shadow of Your wings, I eat my fill from abundance in Your household And I drink from Your streams of rejoicing. You are my King.{/lang-eng}
